actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide certain individuals living abroad an exclusion for income from sources within foreign countries.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income a certain amount of the foreign source income of individuals who are 65 or older.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide certain individuals living abroad an exclusion for income from sources within foreign countries.
